name: Cognitive Ability Test
description: Measures problem-solving and logical reasoning skills.

name: Personality Questionnaire
description: Assesses personality traits and workplace behavior.

name: Numerical Reasoning Test
description: Tests ability to work with numbers, tables, and graphs.

name: Verbal Reasoning Test
description: Measures ability to understand and evaluate written information.

name: Situational Judgement Test
description: Assesses judgment and decision-making in workplace scenarios.

name: Inductive Reasoning Test
description: Evaluates pattern recognition and logical sequencing.

name: English Language Proficiency Test
description: Assesses English grammar, vocabulary, and comprehension.

name: Emotional Intelligence Test
description: Evaluates emotional awareness, control, and empathy.

name: Critical Thinking Test
description: Measures analytical and critical reasoning skills.

name: Work Style Questionnaire
description: Identifies candidate preferences and cultural fit.
